name: Flapi
description:
Made in 48h for the GameJam  Ceci n'est pas un jeu 2018

You are an AI, you have to learn from human to be able to express yourself. Live, laugh and die with them. But can you die? Are you immortal? If so, what are you going to do about that... 

Controls : 

Arrow keys
